title: Figure, "Bust of Nikolai Nekrasov", 1950–60
markings: underside: Lomonosov "LFZ" mark stamped in orange
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
creditline: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds

tombstone.epitaph:
Figure, "Bust of Nikolai Nekrasov", 1950–60.
1950–60. Porcelain (bisque). The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-206.
